english.segment1: Make a way for the love of God. Let the world know that He is near. Valleys rise and mountains will be moved. As our praise rises up to You. I will pray, I will pray. . Chorus:
english.segment2: Let Your kingdom come, pray Your will be done. Nations will see Your fame. On the LordÂ’s day
english.segment3: Coda: I will pray, I will pray. I will pray, I will pray.
